title: XxjonohxX
body: my other account is been hacked can u fix it riot my user XxjonohxX summoners name Dirty117

replies.body:
Your best bet is to submit a support ticket here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Give as much detail as you can in the ticket, and avoid responding to the ticket or creating a new one until someone has gotten back to you, as it can bump you back to the bottom of the queue.
